query.statement:
SELECT 0 AS CHK, T.PSPID, T.POSID, T.INSLFN , T.INSLFN2, T.ZSITE_NM, T.ZZLIFNR , T.GBN, T.FLAG FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT , A.PSPID, A.POSID, B.LIFNR, B.NAMET,B.NAMET2, A.INSLFN AS INSLFN, A.INSLFN AS INSLFN2, (SELECT G.ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS G WHERE A.MANDT = G.MANDT AND A.PSPID= G.POSID) AS ZSITE_NM, E.NAME1 AS ZZLIFNR, A.GBN, CASE WHEN A.INSLFN = B.LIFNR THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FLAG , F.VALUE
FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1401 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID AND A.POSID = B.POSID_1
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS E ON B.MANDT = E.MANDT AND B.LIFNR = E.LIFNR
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS F ON A.MANDT = F.MANDT AND A.POSID = F.HOGI AND F.CHARACTERISTIC in ( 'EL_DREUSE' , 'EL_DKEY') -- 철거비 특성값 AND F.SEQ = ( SELECT MAX(X.SEQ) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = F.MANDT AND X.HOGI = F.HOGI AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = F.CHARACTERISTIC) WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.ZZSHIP1 BETWEEN #ZZSHIPF# AND #ZZSHIPT# AND A.GBN = #GBN# AND A.CONF = '' AND A.ECKEY = ''
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND A.INSLFN = #LIFNR#
AND B.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
) AS T WHERE T.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND T.VALUE = 'Y'
